legitimacy_indicators: Professional domain name mimicking legitimate project
Brand confusion with legitimate XAI token

websites.impersonates: XAI token project by Offchain Labs

social_engineering_tactics: Brand confusion with legitimate crypto project
red_flags: Unsolicited contact from alleged celebrity on Telegram
Celebrity offering direct investment opportunities to strangers
Token name similar but not identical to legitimate project
Direct wallet transfers instead of proper token sale platform
Domain name mimicking but not matching legitimate project
Website taken offline after fund collection
victim_vulnerabilities_exploited: Limited ability to verify token legitimacy
Insufficient due diligence on platforms and projects
defensive_recommendations: Verify celebrity/influencer identity through official verified channels
Research token projects on official websites and blockchain explorers
Be skeptical of unsolicited investment opportunities on social media
Verify domain authenticity and registration details
Never send cryptocurrency to unfamiliar wallets without thorough verification
Understand legitimate token presales use established launchpad platforms
Check for official announcements from legitimate projects about token sales
Be wary of name variations that closely resemble legitimate projects

initial_access.description: Scammer initiated contact with victim on Telegram claiming to be famous influencer

techniques.name: Impersonation
techniques.description: Posed as famous influencer named 'Tai' to establish credibility and trust

techniques.name: Brand Confusion
techniques.description: Created xAI88X token to exploit confusion with legitimate XAI token project

techniques.name: Artificial Scarcity
techniques.description: Positioned investment as exclusive presale opportunity

fund_extraction.method: Direct cryptocurrency transfer to scammer wallet

persistence.description: Platform shut down after fund collection, no ongoing engagement

techniques: Use of cryptocurrency for irreversible transfers

defense_evasion: T1070.004 - Indicator Removal on Host (Website shutdown)
T1027 - Obfuscated Files or Information (Brand confusion)
collection: T1530 - Data from Cloud Storage Object (Cryptocurrency wallet)
impact: T1499 - Endpoint Denial of Service (Platform shutdown)

metadata.analyst_notes: Professional operation with celebrity impersonation and brand confusion tactics. Wallet address is key evidence for blockchain forensics. Quick exit strategy suggests coordinated operation targeting multiple victims.
